website_summaries.verdict: These 36" bubble balls are intended for sparring, not bubble soccer, but they are every bit as much fun.
pros: Two-pack of 36" wearable body bumper bubble balls
One section can pop and the rest stay inflated
Fit kids and average sized adults
Good for wrestling and collision games
cons: May rip at the seams, but if this happens, the chambers don't pop

customer_reviews.title: Nephews clobbered each other & these took it well
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old nephews love these so much. We gave them to them for their birthday after playing putt putt with their parents and sisters. Boys being boys, they put them on right after opening the package and proceeded to bop each other up and down a field. Product surviving them = product well made. It was hard to imagine what size they would be prior to ordering. I would say these are perfect for kids under 10 who aren't too tall. They would probably be too short for everyone else. However, there is plenty of room inside for girth, so if you have a little butterball, fear not, these will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a church function; kids had a blast in them! Fit younger ones and the teenagers, although not as big as the expensive ones (couldn't "barrel roll" the teens in them very well). Didn't have any holes while we used them, but with multiple individual compartments of inflation, they'd still be fun even if they ended up with one or two holes. Will use again in future for youth group games and VBS. Bust a gut laughing at the kids playing with these! The teens said they looked like the "blueberry girl" from Willie Wonka with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Marth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my four nieces but everyone ended up using them!! We had a blast. It says not to use as a float but my nieces could curl up inside them and just float around the ocean and pool. Great buy. Just wish they were a little thicker, lots of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kt Jo

customer_reviews.title: They want to do this activity again! HUGE HIT!
customer_reviews.text: The kids are asking when we can do these again! I bought 4 for our Youth Group. We inflated them using a double action bellows pump from West Marine. Electric ones don't work -- too cheap and they get tired and die. The bellows went FAST and made deflating easy and quiet. We actually put the kids rolled up inside like pill bugs. We had cones and it was a relay to get your entire team to be rolled through the course. They laughed so hard and the balls held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Finch

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved them! They rolled down hills and and enjoyed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for my daughter's birthday party. The kids loved them! They rolled down hills and and enjoyed themselves. The balls stayed in perfect shape. They are sturdy and well made. However, they take a while to inflate, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: 12 Player Bubble Soccer = GREAT SUCCESS
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12 of these for a giant bubble soccer match (I run kids programs at a country club) = the kids were ecstatic!!! I was worried at first about durability because I know how rough kids can be on them but they held up wonderfully. We even had a game that had the kids rolling on the ground inside of them = not a single pop was heard.
customer_reviews.author: Morngrod

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to use. Having an air pump really helped me get these ready fast for my kids. There's a lot of individual air valves, thanks for delivering this on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them but you have to utilize
customer_reviews.text: There ok.. your not paying top dollar but they are a little dangerous for kids because if they fall, they could land on their head (it happened). Kids loved them but you have to utilize safeguards
customer_reviews.author: Helena DiSarro

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money in my opinion. One air pocket didn't stay inflated after the first time playing with these. (You inflate each one in multiple places.) I probably should have returned when I had the chance. Its also just one of those things that seems fun at first, but then what do you do with them? They take a lot of space to store if you leave them inflated...
customer_reviews.author: R Fisher

customer_reviews.title: My son and his friends love it. They are around 49 inches tall and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends love it. They are around 49 inches tall and the bubbke goes from their necks down to almost their ankles/lower legs. They have enough room at the opening to get some speed but not too much. They had a great time. Keep your pump handy lots of impact caused some of the plugs to pop open and deflate some. Even with three sections losing air they bounced and protected the kids when they fell. Worth the money. Play lasted over an hour and had to re-pump twice.
customer_reviews.author: Squouse

customer_reviews.title: Would have been terrific CO VID FUN : did not last a full day
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have received these bumper balls that the grand boys ages 10 & 8 looked forward to have daily fun during the virus lockdown. Alas after spending more than enough lung power and persistence (10 yo) to inflate properly boys went outside for a supposed fun day Guess what?? Less than an hour later one slowly deflated and the other one lost all air So deflated were the boys. Decided to return. Repair patch unable to use Around inflation stem Waste of precious time to locate leak and poor workmanship
customer_reviews.author: woman who lived in a shoe

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.text: So after looking at several brands of these I settled on this one. The kids have had them for one day and the seams are separating on both bubbles. They are having a lot of fun but I had at least hoped to get a solid 7 days of use out of these at least. Just for reference the kids are 7 (boy) & 9 (girl). These would be a great gift if they held up better. Not very difficult to inflate either.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It was fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My 12 y.o. son received these as a Christmas gift. He and his 11 y.o. cousin got to play with them on Christmas day only. After they were done playing with them and they sat for awhile, they were partially deflated. When trying to air them back up, there were multiple holes in the seams of both of them. I am not entirely surprised, however, because they are basically air rafts that are used to bounce into other people. I did give the product 3 stars since they had a lot of fun playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I could use my air pump to blow these suits up. To my dismay, you need to manually blow them up and the suit has multiple sections to blow up. At my sons party, my son's friends were running around with deflated suits. Not sanitary to use especially if multiple people need to blow the suit up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be very aware of comments rating this above 1.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for grandsons 7 and 9 birthdays. Blew them up, kids got into them. Played in front yard for 10 minutes. Both ripped and deflated. Too bad, they looked so cute in them and had us and them laughing. Our front yard is pristine with nothing that would puncture them. Just very poor quality for $50.00. I don't know how people would give these 5 stars ever. Maybe increasing the thickness of pvc would help along with better testing before selling these to customers.
customer_reviews.author: LeeB

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for kids and smaller adults.
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome fun for kids or even small adults. The size of the inner ball is the only reason for the 4 stars. These are not made for larger people. I’m 5’ 1”, average size, and getting in and out of tbe ball requires a little assistance. I love the idea that each cluster of cells is separate so that if there is a leak of any kind you can pinpoint the problem much more easily. Patches are included!
customer_reviews.author: Mariealena Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: super fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 7 yr old twin nephews, they loved them. They would just walk around with them on. They loved rolling off of things and bumping into each other. For their age and being boys these things held up really well. They split at the seams so it was easy to tape up and let them keep playing. They loved them so much it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: only to be disappointed, as they didn't last the first hour
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to share these with family, only to be disappointed, as they didn't last the first hour ... deflated with holes the seller was initially helpful, but ultimately did nothing as far as replacement or refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them but they did ripped on seam ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them but they did ripped on seam the second time he used them. They still stay inflated and can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun overpriced gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift to my 10 year old nephews, so I didn't see them in person. My brother said that there were an insane amount of typos on the box in the warning. They are probably overpriced. I expect that they will pop or leak soon. But my nephews liked them, so I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as new and received an open box with tape on one end and the bumper balls shoved in too tight. This was to be a Christmas gift! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: These were difficult to inflate and the plugs don't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: These were difficult to inflate and the plugs don't stay closed so it is a constant battle to keep them inflated. They are not really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaws

customer_reviews.title: waste of money 💰
customer_reviews.text: I received my bubbles today and after 4 hours of my kids playing with them....they all (4) tore. The seams spilt in several spots on the top and bottom. I am really disappointed in the quality of this product. Luckily the kids are still able to play with them but only until they split all the way down. Probably another day or 2. 😭😡
customer_reviews.author: Ka'Sandra

customer_reviews.title: a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: we used these bubble suits for a sumo wrestling contest during a high school pep rally. the suits held up well despite the rough play. they probably fit a pre-teen better than a 15-18 year old or even an adult. we ordered four suits and used an air compressor to fill them up. there are several valves which would have taken hours to fill and lots of breathes. The sumo wrestling and the pep rally were rousing successes because of these suits.
customer_reviews.author: Coach K

customer_reviews.title: They pop easy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my younger grandchildren. They came early. Were as described for the most part. They had a blast with them, and laughed so much, but... after 4 days one busted and they were no fun any more. So for the amount spent, i was disappointed and so were my 6 grandchildren all 9 and younger. They weren't to rough and were watched the entire time playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspect because 1 of ours was very damaged
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind the only reason I gave them 1 star is because after opening them and blowing them up 1 was full of mini wholes. The patch that was included could do nothing for all the wholes. My daughter has been waiting and was desperate for them to work she asked me to try tape. It held air but nothing compared to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: will be fun
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered yesterday early i blow them up it's a lot of areas to blow up and me and my husband put them on, we have have not play around outside yet with them. I know it would be fun 🤗🤗
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jordan

customer_reviews.title: BEST gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nephew and they LOVED it. It was the perfect socially distant birthday gift for a six year old. I'm not sure who had more fun, the dad or the birthday boy. :) We got videos sent later that night and they had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: htravis

customer_reviews.title: A few hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the cost but they aren't designed to last a really long time. My daughter and a friend enjoyed them for a while. They felt they looked like blueberries which they liked. It kept them busy a while which is always a good thing
customer_reviews.author: THOMASN H QUADE

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun and great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this item! I have 3 boys and they play with this on our trampoline and have an awesome time. My boys are aged 8-14 so great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: They got several leaks on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved them, and they were bigger than I thought. Unfortunately, several leaks made it unusable after about 2 hours of play. Our kids did roll down a hill in them for about 30 minutes, which may have been where the damage came from. I'm thinking about buying another set with a no hill rule upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for price! Kids and adults can enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son's birthday about 2 weeks ago. They were easy to blow up but thought they would be more bubbly and full like the picture. I didn't notice any tears after use. The kids and adults enjoyed them. I will write an updated review when we use again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: They each had a small pin hole in several places that we can not find which made it useless. I purchased this for several of my grand children that live in different states with the same result!
customer_reviews.author: MsJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son and niece had great fun with the bumper balls. It has several sections or compartments to blow up so I recommend that you use a pump and patience. Only four stars because the plastic valves pop out often during play.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Hester

customer_reviews.title: Also fun in the pool and could imagine how much fun in the snow it could be
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my 9 year old. Perfect for the tweens up to adults. Durable. Fun
customer_reviews.author: tjimpa

customer_reviews.title: Used may not be your best option
customer_reviews.text: The seller is very nice. Be aware before you buy. I did not realize this product was used as it is same price as new at vendor site. Used is ok w me but there are about 12 sockets to fill with air per ball. I filled them 3x and each time they are deflated the next day. Too late to replace before my Saturday party. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Treubig

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of two in each box. I bought them for a family reunion n my grandkids and other family members just loved them. It was in the 90’s that day a little too hot but then they had a sprinkler going and they had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Vidaurri

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: We used these inflatable balls for our family Christmas Retreat. They were smaller than anticipated. We had purchased balls a couple of years ago that were bigger. They were okay for the little kids...a little flimsy and didn't seem to hold the air very well. But, they lasted the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart right off the bat!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, terrible construction! Just received them yesterday (6/22/18). They both ripped at the seams as soon as the boys started playing. One of the boys got knocked over and as soon as he hit the ground the seam at the back of the bubble split open from top to bottom. NOT worth the $50 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the balls they are really just for small kids maybe up to age 11
customer_reviews.author: Barbel B.

customer_reviews.title: Short term fun
customer_reviews.text: The girls loved the Bubble Bumper Balls, but by day two one was punctured. I think that the cost and durability didn’t match. I’m really in love with the concept but not with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle L. Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Fun for short time
customer_reviews.text: These were alot of fun for about 8 minutes. After that there's only so much bumping around you can do. Our kids are 10 n 12 do they're pretty rough. They can get hurt so be careful. Watch your surroundings for hard things they can bounce into and hit their head, not to mention puncture.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Bad seems deflated
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for his sixth birthday which was last Friday. These were used by him and his four-year-old sister and his eight-year-old cousin on that day. They were used today by him and his four-year-old sister and many of the cells keep deflating. There is definitely a malfunction in the seams and I would love to get my money back for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jlbeshears23

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for movers and crashers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a gift for our godson who is a sensory kid, who seeks lots of crashing. He LOVES them! I can't speak to the quality or anything because I haven't seen them in person yet, but I can say they have held up for the last two weeks with a 5 and 8 year old using them! These were the perfect gift and the kids are so happy, plus getting the input they need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont Last
customer_reviews.text: My kids have had a blast with these but one of the balls started coming apart at the seams the first time it was out of the package. So they are very cheaply made. Would not recommend buying them as I would not buy them ever again.
customer_reviews.author: NWall126

customer_reviews.title: A lot of work for the fun
customer_reviews.text: The suits worked well but the number of chambers to inflate/deflate was extensive and took a lot of time. While using them the value covers kept popping out so you would have to stop and reinflate, however everyone who used them thought they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Howard

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun for the kids. One of them did split along the seam, but the seller graciously sent along another to replace it. A blast for the kids, but make sure you have pump to blow them up or you'll be there all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t blow up, inflated them Christmas night and by Christmas morning they were deflated without any use. I was really sad because my boys were really excited about them.
customer_reviews.author: Makelle Ahlin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok, but on first use,split up the the side seam on a six year old. Not durable. Fun while it lasted, but kinda pricy for a half-hour toy.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These things ripped apart at the seams in less than an hour of using them. Very cheap design. Might work well for really little kids but my 11 year olds didn't enjoy them. I ended up throwing them all away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I had these bubble suits shipped to my grandkids while they were on vacation at the beach and they absolutely loved them! And after bringing them back home they still do!
customer_reviews.author: dwight frederick

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: They're not actually round and collapse in on themselves really easily even when fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Angel H.

customer_reviews.title: Deflated Bumper Balls.
customer_reviews.text: Did not last very long. Have deflated after a few uses by feb 2018. My grandsons are unable to use set! Will not inflate!! Useless & waste of my $$ for Christmas gift 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Got them and both had about 15 little pin holes in them. I knew the kids would pop them but atleast get to play with them first. Luckily I had some summer floaties that had extra patches and they got to play for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to blow up. They do not stay inflated for more than an hour. The plugs pop open. Very poor quality. Had I kept the box, I would send Jen back .
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Fun, Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved playing with these!- the only downside for parents (and grandparents), is that it took longer to blow it up than the time kids spent playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: D. maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! I bought them for my nephew and we’ve had hours of fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Waters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but really wish I wasn’t!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson to have a play day ; something new and fun during the quarantine. I will say the kids had a great time with them. They honestly were not even as rough on them as I thought they were going to be ( boys ages 8-12) and already, after one day of use ( literally just 2 hours in) there is a small leak. Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The children completely enjoyed these. They do have to be careful not to hit heads together.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: These tore  easily
customer_reviews.text: Don't even bother. I literally just received these 2 days ago and they are almost completely torn as the seams already These have only being used but a 9 and 7 years old. I was didn't think they would last forever but 2 days is ridiculous. I am going to request a return.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls started to split in half along the seem durring our first use. We had to tape it in order for the kids to keep playing. These were being used by a 4and 7 year old. So really lightly. Also during the 1st use various compartments kept deflating and we would have to keep inflating them. These balls are crap. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Porter

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hold Air
customer_reviews.text: These lost their air almost immediately. We had one day of fun and they started to deflate. They are not even usable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Utter crap
customer_reviews.text: These balls are total crap. Literally a concussion waiting to happen. The kids can’t possibly bop into each other without getting hurt. There is barely any padding when they’re blown up. A total disappointment. Not at all what we wanted as a big gift from Santa.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift - review only from visual examination.
customer_reviews.text: This is for a Christmas gift. We opened it to check it for leaks and it looks OK. Will re-review after using it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loves them! I was surprised by the number of individual chambers in the ball. The pro - if it sustains damage somewhere it will only effect that chamber and not the entire ball; the con - having multiple locations to fill with air and access points tend to stick out rather than push in flush with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Burst easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our school Fall Carnival expecting to get several years out of them, but by the time the 4 hours were over all but 1 of them had parts that had popped. Maybe works better without the abuse teenagers give them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive 1 hour of play.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and the kids loved it. The seams on both of them split the first day and one section became deflated as well. Expensive at $40 for about 1 hour of play. Both my kids weigh less than 50 pounds. Adults would tear this up in a second.
customer_reviews.author: mthomas

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: They fit a large 7 year old with room to spare all the way up to an adult. They inflate in several different areas so even if one section deflates the ball is not ruined. My kids immediately took them outside and rolled down the front yard and they held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith K. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My son got these for his birthday. When we finally got around to open them, one already had a huge hole and so it was totally unusable. We were 2 days past the return date, so money down the drain. Don’t waste your money, or if you do purchase, open immediately. It looked like fun if the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: TRichards

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: One of the most hilarious products I ever bought. Although they are made for kids, when the adults put them on . . . hours of laughter!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Ripped and popped on first use
customer_reviews.text: Very first use it ripped. The other one doesn't hold air. They are going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 yr old grandson and he loved them. He and his 8 yr old brother played with them for about 30 minutes and then one of them ‘ripped’!!! No hole just a big rip on side!!!! Idea is great and fun but quality is not worth the money. I would not buy these again!!!! I returned them for my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: These were a blast!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use in our school's fall festival. They were a hit!! The most popular attraction. We used them for children as well as adults. We purchased mma helmets just for extra protection, and let them go. No injuries and so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for Cousins Ages 6 and 11
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bubble bumper balls for my nephew's sixth birthday. He is an active kid that's prone to bumping into things. I initially got them as a bit of a joke, but he and my 11 year old daughter had great fun bouncing off of each other outside after his party. Plus, no bruises! He later used with his father and ran off some steam. Made for a funny video. Now I'm just hoping he won't break an arm if he hits the ground sideways. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: Great for one days worth of play!
customer_reviews.text: The kids liked them but after one day of play the seams started splitting. It takes a long time to blow them up.. had to use a hand pump. The boys do like them but don’t expect them to be around much longer after the seam rips all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Dgleffew

customer_reviews.title: Small but fun!
customer_reviews.text: These were small, and a plus-size adult wouldn’t fit, but my kids had fun!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaNTony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: I would say this works for smaller children - maybe younger than 10. It’s not durable enough for teens and adults. Perfect for younger kids to play around with though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for 2 12 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to blow up enough to be bouncy. Not big enough to bubble you around.
customer_reviews.author: joe willis

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved these, they held up much better than I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved these, they held up much better than I'd expected. We live in the mountains and sometimes the ground can be a little rocky here and there, I was concerned they could pop easily but we didn't have any problems and the kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: GoBroBrand Bubble Bumper Balls 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 and he loves these but they don't last very long. The air was in them for 1 day and I had to put air in them again and it doesn't stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Vlad

customer_reviews.title: old) for Christmas and he loved it! It came in time and was well ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 (2- 2 packs) for our youngest son (10 yrs. old) for Christmas and he loved it! It came in time and was well packaged. I highly recommend it! A fun family activity!
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've found something else.
customer_reviews.text: Inflated it, and within 5 minutes it deflated. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fits adults and kids, had a blast playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: great fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: It's great that there is 2 in the box so without another purchase 2 kids can play together. And it's only been 3 days but they have had plenty of use and are still fully inflated! For a 9 year old this has been a perfect birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The kids were so excited to play, but the air wouldn't stay in ..
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Moore

customer_reviews.title: REALLY, AMAZON???
customer_reviews.text: I AM NOT SURE WHO THESE BALLS WERE MADE FOR- ONE OF THEM ONLY HAS ONE ARM HOLE! WHAT HAPPENED TO QUALITY CONTROL? I THINK THE PERCENTAGE OF THE POPULATION WITH ONLY ONE ARM IS SO SMALL THAT IT WOULD NOT MAKE SENSE TO PRODUCE A BALL FOR THEM. BUT, WHAT DO I KNOW?
customer_reviews.author: Jaharring

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase and I believe that the kids like ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for niece and nephew. Very happy with purchase and I believe that the kids like them, so another positive experience with amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for a 7 year old and 12 year old. Was given to them on Christmas Day. By that night one had popped and torn on one side. An expensive gift that did not last even 24 hours. And.....they were not being overly rough with them. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Bumper Balls are a bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. After one use the seams on the sides began to tear. This happened on both bubble bumper balls. I feel it is a poor design and not a quality product. I feel they were properly inflated and properly used.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Farris

customer_reviews.title: Strong quality product
customer_reviews.text: These were great fun for our 13 year old’s birthday party. They can really take a lot of bumps and knocks!! It added so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I even had fun bouncing around the yard
customer_reviews.text: The kids are having a blast with these. I even had fun bouncing around the yard. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, great gift
customer_reviews.text: We gave these to my nephew for his 11th birthday. They were a hit! The boys immediately started playing with them and were having a blast. It made for some great slowmo vidoes too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mendez

customer_reviews.title: bumper balls
customer_reviews.text: These came fast when ordered as my daughter needed them for a science project at school! They were peferctly sized, blew up fast and worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: the plastic bubble was not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the quality. One of the air pockets burst upon inflation. The gift was for an eight year old. A larger person could not have fit or used the product. I feel it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: They were not worth the price since they can't stay blown up long enough to play with them.
customer_reviews.text: The air comes out of them instantly after blowing up. The plugs on half of both of them don't stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need an air compressor for easy and quick blow up.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for another use (project). We had to use the air compressor to blow it up because it has so many different chambers. They are large enough for an adult to fit in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on this product I bought these for my son birthday and the quality sucks and they're cheaply made I ordered 2 sets just in case something went wrong and to my surprise both sets had holes in them total waste
customer_reviews.author: B. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Better results if you use a pump
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very pleased with these and I found blowing up with a pump you will get better results then manual as it's pretty tough material. They were great for a party, size fit my son 10 up to adults very comfortable and overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Marengere

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!! No parts. No noises. My grandsons can’t stop playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R.

customer_reviews.title: These are cheap quality and don't even hold the air
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive for the dollar store quality. They didn't even hold the air that took two hours to pump in them. I couldn't get a refund....I would appreciate it if this company rectified this and returned them with a shipping label.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: GoBroBrand Bubble Bumper Balls 2 pack of Inflatable Buddy hamster Bbop Ball set - Used also as Giga Sumo Wearable human zorb soccer Suits for outdoor play. Size: 36" For Kids & Adults of all ages
product_meta.description:
GoBroBrand Giant Inflatable Body Bumper Balls 36" - SET OF 2 

The GoBroBrand Giant Inflatable Body Bumper Balls 36" is awesome for sports, exercise, activity and game time. Can be enjoyed almost anywhere under the sky. It is created with Safe and durable plastic which is soft enough to keep it lightweight. Perfect for children and adults alike.

Get yourself or your child moving. Enjoy some physical outdoor exercise and rev up the fun. It's a great way to bring on action at your party, at the beach, in your backyard with family and friends. Enjoy endless hours of fun outdoors by playing soccer, bumping balls, etc.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed! 30 Day Warranty from GoBroBrand. We did work very hard to improve our customers experience and only carry high quality tested products. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEED! We will refund you if you are not satisfied with your purchase for any reason
feature_bullets: PRODUCT INCLUDES - A Two Pack of 36 Inch Heavy Duty wearable Body Bumper Bubble Balls, And a repair kit of 4 hole patches with instructions. Remember to close the valve and then push it into the ball to avoid losing air while playing

SAFE DURABLE ECO FRIENDLY - Made of heavy duty durable PVC vinyl that is heat sealed and quality tested by a CPSC Approved lab for safety and material testing on this sumo zorb hamster for human bumper ball set - Adult Supervision is Required.

UNLIMITED USE & PORTABLE COMPACT - The Bumper Balls are collapsible and compact for transport and easily inflate in minutes in deflate when opened valves and pressing down, it comes in a small nice packaging folding easy for your car trunk and luggage

SUITABLE FOR FAMILY ACTIVE PLAY - Starting with the little sweet kid at age 5 and upto the in fit grandpa, its A really Perfect for family gathering games, field trips, birthdays, barbecues, camp activities, beach sports, parks or in your very own backyard
